# ❤️ Sponsors of RickCreator87

Thank you for supporting my work. Your contributions help me continue building
audit‑ready infrastructure, developer tooling, and automation systems across the
GitDigital ecosystem.

## Why sponsor?
- You support open‑source compliance, automation, and governance tools.
- You help fund ongoing development of GitDigital Products, OpenGrantStack, and
  Solana‑aligned infrastructure.
- You enable me to dedicate more time to building high‑quality, well‑documented,
  reviewer‑friendly systems.

Your support means a lot.
